summary: The Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands is a U.S territory in the Pacific. Its workforce has changed substantially since 2000, and its tourism-based economy was hit hard by COVID-19 . We reviewed trends in its workforce and wage distribution and found: The number of foreign workers fell 73% from 2001-2020 U.S. workers were about half of the workforce in 2016 but 59% in 2020...
title: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands: Recent Workforce Trends and Wage Distribution
